author: Aris Folley
title: China labels Missouri lawsuit over coronavirus outbreak 'very absurd'
description: China is firing back against a lawsuit Missouri brought earlier this week over Beijing's handling of the novel coronavirus outbreak, which was first detected in Wuhan, China, last year and has left more than 45,000 people...
content: China is firing back against a lawsuit Missouri brought earlier this week over Beijing's handling of the novel coronavirus outbreak, which was first detected in Wuhan, China, last year and has left more than 45,000 people dead across the United States so far.… [+2496 chars]
